languages.text: "Ты нахваливаешь мутанта из черни, хотя он сотворил столько зверств?"
"You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"
languages.original_text: "Ты нахваливаешь мутанта из черни, хотя он сотворил столько зверств?"

traits.locale_text: "You praise a lowborn mutant despite the atrocities he has done?"
"You praise a lowborn mutant despite the atrocities he has done?"
"You praise a lowborn mutant despite the atrocities he has committed?"
"You praise a lowborn mutant despite the atrocities he has committed?"
"You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"
"You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

languages.text: “尽管这个出身低贱的变种人犯下了恶行，但你依然称赞他？”
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: “尽管这个出身低贱的变种人犯下了恶行，但你依然称赞他？”

languages.text: «¿Elogia al mutante plebeyo a pesar de las tropelías que ha cometido?».
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Elogia al mutante plebeyo a pesar de las tropelías que ha cometido?».

languages.text: "İşlediği iğrenç eylemlere rağmen alta tabakadan mutanta övgüler mi düzüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: "İşlediği iğrenç eylemlere rağmen alta tabakadan mutanta övgüler mi düzüyorsun?"

languages.text: 「彼の卑劣な行いにもかかわらず、この低い生まれの変異体を賞賛するのか？」
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼の卑劣な行いにもかかわらず、この低い生まれの変異体を賞賛するのか？」

languages.text: « Vous plaidez en faveur du mutant de basse extraction malgré les crimes innommables qu'il a commis ? »
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous plaidez en faveur du mutant de basse extraction malgré les crimes innommables qu'il a commis ? »

languages.text: "Ihr preist den niedergeborenen Mutanten trotz seiner grausamen Verbrechen?"
languages.original_text: "You praise the lowborn mutant despite the vicious acts he has committed?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr preist den niedergeborenen Mutanten trotz seiner grausamen Verbrechen?"
